title: Add member registration section and form (frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Add a new member registration section in the main page flow and link to it from the header navigation with smooth-scroll.
acceptanceCriteria: A new section exists in the main page flow with a stable anchor id (e.g., "member-registration").
Site header navigation includes a new item (label in English) that smooth-scrolls to the member registration section on desktop and mobile menus.
The new section is rendered from App.tsx in the correct order alongside existing sections.
All user-facing text introduced by this feature is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a new section component with a stable anchor id "member-registration" and English-only headings/body text. Compose existing shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Input, Textarea, Button, Label, Alert) for layout and messaging. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Import and render the new MemberRegistrationSection from App.tsx in the intended order alongside existing sections (e.g., placed before ContactSection) so it is part of the main single-page flow.

Add a new header navigation item with an English label (e.g., "Member Registration") pointing to the "member-registration" section id, ensuring existing smooth-scroll behavior works for both desktop and mobile menus. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement the member registration form UI with client-side validation, demo-only disclaimer, and simulated submission feedback (no backend calls).
acceptanceCriteria: The form includes, at minimum: Full name, Phone number, Email (optional), District/State, and a short "Why do you want to join?" message.
Client-side validation blocks submission when required fields are missing and shows an error toast/message in English.
On successful simulated submission, show an English success toast/message and reset the form fields.
A visible disclaimer in English states that this is a demo form and submissions are not currently delivered or stored.
No calls are made to the Motoko backend actor for this form.

file_operations.description: Implement the registration form fields (Full name, Phone number, optional Email, District/State, and a short message), add client-side validation (block submit + show English toast/message when invalid), simulate a successful submission (English success toast/message + reset fields), and render a visible English disclaimer stating submissions are not delivered/stored. Use the existing toast system (sonner) and compose shadcn-ui form components without editing files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
